issue.title: Add overload `EnableRetryOnFailure` that allows specifying `errorCodesToAdd` without count / delay

type.name: Feature
type.description: A request, idea, or new functionality

repository.name: efcore.pg
repository.description: Entity Framework Core provider for PostgreSQL

issue.body:
Feature request: add another overload to `NpgsqlDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure` that takes `errorCodesToAdd` without forcing `maxRetryCount` and `maxRetryDelay` to be added.

I want to keep the latter two default, so I copied the values from [ExecutionStrategy](https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/blob/main/src/EFCore/Storage/ExecutionStrategy.cs) as they're protected and so not visible externally, but it would be nicer if I didn't have to do this and could just specify the `errorCodesToAdd` property I'm interested in.

issue.title: Add overload to SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure with errorNumbersToAdd without forcing maxRetryCount and maxRetryDelay

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Add overload to `SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure` with `errorNumbersToAdd` without forcing `maxRetryCount` and `maxRetryDelay`

Fixes #27074

Please review
